description: Enterprise techniques used by Industroyer2, ATT&CK software S1072 (v1.0)
name: Industroyer2 (S1072)

techniques.comment: [Industroyer2](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1072) has the ability to cyclically enumerate running processes such as PServiceControl.exe, PService_PDD.exe, and other targets supplied through a hardcoded configuration.(Citation: Industroyer2 Mandiant April 2022)
